verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, ye <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, because there is no <S%H571>truth<s%>, nor <S%H2617>mercy<s%>, nor <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

By <S%H422>swearing<s%>, and <S%H3584>lying<s%>, and <S%H7523>killing<s%>, and <S%H1589>stealing<s%>, and committing <S%H5003>adultery<s%>, they break <S%H6555>out<s%>, and <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>. blood: Heb. bloods

Therefore shall the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H56>mourn<s%>, and every one that <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> therein shall <S%H535>languish<s%>, with the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and with the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; yea, the <S%H1709>fishes<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> also shall be taken <S%H622>away<s%>.
Yet let no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7378>strive<s%>, nor <S%H3198>reprove<s%> <S%H376>another<s%>: for thy <S%H5971>people<s%> are as they that <S%H7378>strive<s%> with the <S%H3548>priest<s%>.

Therefore shalt thou <S%H3782>fall<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%>, and the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> also shall <S%H3782>fall<s%> with thee in the <S%H3915>night<s%>, and I will <S%H1820>destroy<s%> thy <S%H517>mother<s%>. destroy: Heb. cut off

My <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H1820>destroyed<s%> for lack of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>: because thou hast <S%H3988>rejected<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>, I will also <S%H3988>reject<s%> thee, that thou shalt be no <S%H3547>priest<s%> to me: seeing thou hast <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of thy <S%H430>God<s%>, I will also <S%H7911>forget<s%> thy <S%H1121>children<s%>. destroyed: Heb. cut off
As they were <S%H7230>increased<s%>, so they <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against me: therefore will I <S%H4171>change<s%> their <S%H3519>glory<s%> into <S%H7036>shame<s%>.
They eat <S%H398>up<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and they <S%H5375>set<s%> their <S%H5315>heart<s%> on their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>. set: Heb. lift up their soul to

And there shall be, like <S%H5971>people<s%>, like <S%H3548>priest<s%>: and I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> them for their <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and <S%H7725>reward<s%> them their <S%H4611>doings<s%>. punish: Heb. visit upon reward: Heb. cause to return

For they shall <S%H398>eat<s%>, and not have <S%H7646>enough<s%>: they shall commit <S%H2181>whoredom<s%>, and shall not <S%H6555>increase<s%>: because they have left <S%H5800>off<s%> to take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> counsel at their <S%H6086>stocks<s%>, and their <S%H4731>staff<s%> <S%H5046>declareth<s%> unto them: for the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2183>whoredoms<s%> hath caused them to <S%H8582>err<s%>, and they have gone a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> from under their <S%H430>God<s%>.

They <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> upon the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> upon the <S%H1389>hills<s%>, under <S%H437>oaks<s%> and <S%H3839>poplars<s%> and <S%H424>elms<s%>, because the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> thereof is <S%H2896>good<s%>: therefore your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall commit <S%H2181>whoredom<s%>, and your <S%H3618>spouses<s%> shall commit <S%H5003>adultery<s%>.

I will not <S%H6485>punish<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> when they commit <S%H2181>whoredom<s%>, nor your <S%H3618>spouses<s%> when they commit <S%H5003>adultery<s%>: for themselves are <S%H6504>separated<s%> with <S%H2181>whores<s%>, and they <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> with <S%H6948>harlots<s%>: therefore the <S%H5971>people<s%> that doth not <S%H995>understand<s%> shall <S%H3832>fall<s%>. I will not: or, Shall I not fall: or, be punished

Though thou, <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, play the <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, yet let not <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H816>offend<s%>; and <S%H935>come<s%> not ye unto <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>, neither go ye <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1007>Bethaven<s%>, nor <S%H7650>swear<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>.

For <S%H3478>Israel<s%> slideth <S%H5637>back<s%> as a <S%H5637>backsliding<s%> <S%H6510>heifer<s%>: now the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7462>feed<s%> them as a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> in a large <S%H4800>place<s%>.

The <S%H7307>wind<s%> hath bound her <S%H6887>up<s%> in her <S%H3671>wings<s%>, and they shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> because of their <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>.
